room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Knoxville in Knoxville
review: I had an amazing adventure with my son today. The scenario we were in was a museum heist of a painting. Had to go through several and more steps to solve the caper. Was very well thought out and very fun. My advice is to go with 4 people instead of 2. They have several other scenarios, we chose the more timid one. I highly recommend the experience. Very fun.

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Knoxville in Knoxville
review: Today we used Breakout for team building event. We had 20 that used 3 different rooms and themes. The team I was on did the museum heist. What a fun and great team building experience. We completed and escaped in 57 minutes. Our other two teams time expired. Our team moderator from Breakout helped make the experience more fun.(Preston) At dinner this evening all of our team members we're talking very excited about the event. #breakout

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Knoxville in Knoxville
review: 3rd Escape Room, Museum Heist, so far the best experience.

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Knoxville in Knoxville
review: I've got twice now and both games have been amazing! Friendly staff and great games. Highly recommend it.

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Knoxville in Knoxville
review: These guys are the best with the best escape games around! If you've never tried an escape game you have got to give Breakout Knoxville a shot! You will not be let down. These guys are wonderful! My group has been to every game they have created and we can't wait for the next challenge!
